    • Uses of WindowedDataStream in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected WindowedDataStream<OUT> WindowedDataStream.copy() 
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> WindowedDataStream.every(WindowingHelper... policyHelpers)
      Defines the slide size (trigger frequency) for the windowed data stream.
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> WindowedDataStream.groupBy(int... fields)
      Groups the elements of the WindowedDataStream by the given key positions.
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> WindowedDataStream.groupBy(KeySelector<OUT,?> keySelector)
      Groups the elements of the WindowedDataStream using the given KeySelector.
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> WindowedDataStream.groupBy(String... fields)
      Groups the elements of the WindowedDataStream by the given field expressions.
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> DataStream.window(List<TriggerPolicy<OUT>> triggers, List<EvictionPolicy<OUT>> evicters)
      Create a WindowedDataStream using the given TriggerPolicy s and EvictionPolicys.
      WindowedDataStream<OUT> DataStream.window(WindowingHelper... policyHelpers)
      Create a WindowedDataStream that can be used to apply transformation like reduce(org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.ReduceFunction<OUT>) or aggregations on preset chunks(windows) of the data stream.
